attributes.action: Bring home all the troops in Afghanistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having a son who served in both gulf wars agrees that history tells us that we can never win a war against terrorism and particularly in Afghanistan( proof Northern Ireland and Iraq) you Mr Brown have refused all your time in office to adequately fund our heroes in the forces

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
